sources.title: Horror 1976 - Track of the Moon Beast - Deadliest Meteor Shower Creates A Monster
sources.description:
When a late‚Äënight meteor shower lights up the New Mexico sky, a young mineralogist student named Paul Carlson is struck in the head by a tiny shard of a meteor, and  turns him into a nocturnal nightmare, moonwalking as a scaly saboteur across Albuquerque.  Kathy and Johnny Longbow stew over a cure before the next full moon triggers his final metamorphic meltdown.  As moonlit nights approach, strange symptoms, eerie legends, and some serious desert mystery collide in a tale that blends lab coats, folklore, and a classic creature feature vibe.
